.. imgPreprocessor documentation master file, created by
   sphinx-quickstart on Sat Dec  7 14:24:21 2024.
   You can adapt this file completely to your liking, but it should at least
   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Usage
=====

installation
------------

to use imgPreprocessor,first install it using pip:

.. code-block:: console

   (.venv) $ pip install imgPreprocessor

The five features
-----------------

put the image path and tyoe of img(ex.png,jpg,jpeg,...)
You can use the def under! 

CountFace: :ref:`CountFace<countface_section>` for details

delexif: :ref:`delexif<delexif_section>` for details

CustomBlurFilter: :ref:`CustomBlurFilter<CustomBlurFilter_section>` for details

ColorFilter: :ref:`ColorFilter<ColorFilter_section>` for details

color_extracter: :ref:`color_extracter<color_extracter_section>` for details
